https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vlClXYkoHVRZGmQ7GfBZqaufd4G.jpg Director Agnès Varda gathers some of her collaborators from JACQUOT DE NANTES to discuss their experiences making the film, as well as show Varda wove her grief over the loss of her husband, Jacques Demy, into other projects. Agnès Tells a Sad and Happy Story
